Body: I have installed the latest factory image for Android Lollipop version from Google site to my Nexus 5 device.When I am updating apps from Play Store, "Update all" option is not working. Some of individual apps like Maps, Calendar also shows indefinite spinner. Google Fit, Google Keep, Maps and Play Music apps are not updating. Getting error:   Could not be downloaded due to an error (495)
Title: Play Store Android apps are not updating in Android Lollipop (Error code: 495)
